original: 漢中之戰，大開營門、偃旗息鼓，忽擂鼓勁弩，致曹軍墮漢水而死。劉備讚「子龍一身都是膽也！」(奪漢中屏障，不久創立蜀漢)
text: The battle of Hanzhong, the gate of the camp was opened, the flag died down, and the crossbow was beaten suddenly, causing Cao Jun to fall into the river and die. Liu Beizan "Zilong is a courageous person!" (Seize the barrier in the Han, and soon founded the Shuhan)
